greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between n and the result of "Phi-summation" over unitary divisors of n.
comment: Squarefree numbers are roots of a(n)=0 equation, while Min n for which a(n)=k is k^2. See also A000188, A008833.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = n - Sum_{u|n, gcd(u,n/u) = 1} phi(u), i.e. when u is a unitary divisor of n.
mathematica: Table[n - DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[#] &, CoprimeQ[#, n/#] &], {n, 92}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Oct 26 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = n - sumdiv(n, d, if (gcd(d, n/d)==1, eulerphi(d))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 27 2017
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 07 2000
